Attention Deck 3: Whoever parked the mech in front of the cafeteria again—move it. You are blocking breakfast. This is an act of war.
Command to {squad}: Your ammo requisition form has been denied. Also approved. Also lost. Please stop sending death threats to Logistics.
Medical to all units: No, caffeine patches are not a substitute for sleeping. We can hear your hearts screaming from here.
Security Note: If you find a live grenade in the hallway, it is probably not a prank. Probably.
Visceral veterans on Deck 1, please stop microwaving your rations with the shock coils. You are scaring the new recruits.
Bridge to Engineering: Why is the gravity at 0.8? The captain just drifted past the viewport like a depressed balloon.
Friendly reminder: The 'Emergency Chocolate Reserve' is for morale crises only. Not for boredom, breakups, or losing at cards.
Attention squads: The firing range is closed until further notice due to… whatever the hell that was. The walls are melting.
Comm to All: Whoever keeps rewriting the 'Daily Protocol Update' into a recipe for lasagna—please continue. It is improving morale.
Pilot Wing notice: Please stop naming your fighters rude things, we can hear it over the radio. Especially during live operations.
Reminder: The 41-Rank System does not include 'Snackmaster', 'Ammo Goblin', or 'Professional Problem'. Stop adding ranks.
Deck 7, your drone has escaped containment again. If it asks for a union contract, just ignore it.
Attention: Someone reprogrammed the cleaning bots to shout 'MOVE, PEASANT' when passing people. Report to Engineering immediately… after we finish laughing.
Visceral archive note: Please return the dismemberment saw to MedBay. It is not a vibro-guitar. It is not for concerts.
Command to all squads: Stop using the captain’s locker as a poker room. He WILL find you. And he WILL join in.
Morale Check: If your squad hasn’t threatened to overthrow command by lunchtime, go drink water. You're clearly not yourselves today.
Combat Channel broadcasting: 'Someone is playing chess with nuclear warheads again.' Recommend turning off Channel 7 for your sanity.
To whoever wrote 'ABANDON ALL HOPE' above the airlock door: We know it was a joke, but remove it. The recruits keep crying.
Biohazard notice: If your experiment starts talking, feeding itself, or filing paperwork—run.
Intercom glitch report: The system keeps randomly boosting volume. Apologies to everyone who just had their eardrums vaporized.
Attention: Pizza delivery drone sighted near Voronoi Base. Intercept?
{squad} accidentally swapped their ammo crates with cooking supplies.
Incoming: rogue maintenance robot is now dancing in sector Bravo.
Warning: Captain found sleeping inside a Quadrons hull.
{squad} engaged in tactical pillow fight. Casualties: none.
Recon report: Drones spotted forming a conga line.
